title: bArE gOpyamma
sahitya:
bArE gOpyamma nimma bAlayyaLutAne bArE gOpyamma


anupallavi

  Aru tUgidaru malaganu muravairi bArE gOpyamma


caraNam 1    nIroLu muLugi mai oresendaLutAne bArE gOpyamma 
mEruva hottu mai bhAravendaLutAnE bArE gOpyamma
    caraNam 2    dharaNi kOreyaliTTu davaDe nondaLutAne bArE gOpyamma 
duruLa rakkasana karuLa kaNDaLutAne bArE gOpyamma
    caraNam 3    nelananaLedu puTTa beraLu nondaLutAne bArE gOpyamma 
chaladinda koDaliya piDidendaLutAne bArE gOpyamma]
    caraNam 4    balu sainya kapigaLa nODenendaLutAne bArE gOpyamma 
neluvina beNNeyu nilukadendeLutAne bArE gOpyamma 
    caraNam 5    battale nintavara etti koLLendaLutAne bArE gOpyamma 
uttama tEjiya hattEnendaLutAne gOpyamma
    caraNam 6    toTTiloLage malagalollanu muravairi bArE gOpyamma 
diTTa shrI purandara viTTalke mole koDu bArE gOpyamma
